name: AVAssetReaderOutputCaptionAdaptor
desc: An object that reads caption group objects from an asset track that contains timed text.

items.name: init(assetReaderTrackOutput: AVAssetReaderTrackOutput)
items.desc: Creates a caption adaptor that reads from a track output.

items.name: var assetReaderTrackOutput: AVAssetReaderTrackOutput
items.desc: The associated asset reader track output.

items.name: var validationDelegate: AVAssetReaderCaptionValidationHandling?
items.desc: A delegate object that handles callbacks to the caption adaptor.

items.name: protocol AVAssetReaderCaptionValidationHandling
items.desc: A protocol that defines the methods for caption validation events.

items.name: func captionsNotPresentInPreviousGroups(in: AVCaptionGroup) -> [AVCaption]
items.desc: Returns the set of captions in the caption group that werenâ€™t vended by the adaptor.
